comments:
Exception thrown every time I open html source editor

This is because of the below line in 
org.eclipse.wst.html.ui.views.contentoutline.HTMLNodeActionManager#updateCase

Preferences prefs = Platform.getPlugin
("com.ibm.sse.model.html").getPluginPreferences(); //$NON-NLS-1$

it should be:
Preferences prefs = Platform.getPlugin
("org.eclipse.wst.html.ui").getPluginPreferences(); //$NON-NLS-1$

Created an attachment (id=16101)
org.eclipse.wst.html.ui

Here is a patch that fixes this bug (details of the patch are in the comment
above)

Looks like a larger problem with the HTML preferences and behavior controlling
the case in the Outline view.

Changed all of the preference values and related preference users to use
integers instead of Strings.  Changes checked into HEAD.
